generated_description:
**Velorum Therapeutics: Sparking Hope in Oncology**

Founded in 2023 and situated in the vibrant San Francisco Bay Area, Velorum Therapeutics is making waves as a groundbreaking biotech company. Its mission? To develop powerful cancer drugs that literally starve tumors by tapping into the intricacies of cancer metabolism. This approach represents a fresh perspective in oncology, aiming to disrupt the status quo in cancer treatment.

As a member of the Y Combinator W24 cohort, Velorum is backed by one of the most prestigious accelerator programs in the world, which adds a layer of credibility to its innovative endeavors. The company currently operates with a lean team of three passionate employees, focusing on bringing cutting-edge cancer therapies to the forefront of medical science.

At the heart of Velorum’s strategy is a keen emphasis on heme biology. The company recognizes that heme—a crucial iron-containing molecule—plays a fundamental role in vital biological processes such as oxygen transport and energy generation. Unfortunately, this essential molecule has been overlooked in traditional drug development. Velorum aims to change that.

Cancer, as we've learned, often exploits bodily resources to fuel its growth, and heme is no exception. By understanding and manipulating how tumors consume heme, Velorum is on the path to developing therapies that can starve these malignant cells. Their pipeline of innovative treatments is tailored towards patients with urgent medical needs, potentially offering new options where few exist.

If you want to explore Velorum Therapeutics more or have the uneasy pleasure of diving into their ambitious vision, check out their website [here](https://www.velorumtx.com). This is not just another biotech—this is a company with a mission to transform the narratives surrounding cancer treatment and patient care. In a world often starved for innovation, Velorum Therapeutics stands as a beacon of hope.
